title: Gallery

body: “Silver Alicorn” is the pseudonymous creator of Cosmosporia. They currently resides somewhere in southern California. Their hobbies include hiking, pinball, reading and writing science fiction, writing music and hacking electronics. Their favorite authors include Iain M. Banks, Adrian Tschaikovsky, Ann Leckie, Yoon Ha Lee and Ursula K. Le Guin. Favorite video games are Kerbal Space Program, Juno: New Origins, Mass Effect, Elite Dangerous, Civilization: Beyond Earth… you get the idea. Space.
